Class StoreController

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g10.abstractClass.AbstractController
ulb.infof307.g10.app.controllers.StoreController
public class StoreController extends AbstractController
This class is the controller passed to store view

  • Method Details

    • buttonHandler

      public void buttonHandler(int window, String action, List<Object> information)
      This method is called whenever a button is pressed. It redirects the call to the correct method
      Parameters:
      window - Number representing the window that called this method
      action - Name of the button function that was called in the window
      information - A list containing the information required to execute the function

      Returns:

    • buyDeck

      public void buyDeck(List<Object> information)
      This method buys a deck adding it to th decks of the user
      Parameters:
      information - Contains name of the bought deck and name of the user selling the deck

    • getCardCountInDeck

      public int getCardCountInDeck(String deckName, String username)
      This method gives the number of cards present in a deck
      Parameters:
      deckName - Name of the deck
      username - Name of the user the deck belongs to
      Returns:
      An in t containing the number of cards

    • setStoreDeckInfo

      public void setStoreDeckInfo(List<Object> information)
      This method updates the price and status(if it's for sale or not of a deck)
      Parameters:
      information - List containing information required for the update in this case [deckName, price, if it's for sale]
